definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
(of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)

sentences.english: She also changed attitudes towards women's dress, says Professor Cawthon.
sentences.chinese: 她还改变了人们对于女装的态度，卡森教授说。

sentences.english: According to a police report, Burrow was dressed as a woman and wearing a wig.
sentences.chinese: 根据警方报告，柏洛男扮女装，还戴假发。

sentences.english: Shawn and Marlon Wayans According to the movies, FBI agents are always dressing in drag.
sentences.chinese: 通过电影会发现FBI探员经常男扮女装。

sentences.english: We would like to receive additional information about your haut couture Autumn Collection.
sentences.chinese: 希望贵方提供秋季系列女装的进一步资料。

sentences.english: The first time I dressed up as a woman was Hallowe'en1).
sentences.chinese: 我第一次男扮女装是在一次万圣节前夕。

sentences.english: Georgian fashion designers show their Spring-Summer, 2011 women's collections.
sentences.chinese: 格鲁吉亚时装设计师展示2011年春夏女装。

sentences.english: Carrie had thought of going for a walk, and had put on a light grey woollen dress with a jaunty double-breasted jacket.
sentences.chinese: 她已穿上淡灰羊毛女装，外罩一件时髦的双排扣上装。

sentences.english: This city each big market management brand female attire.
sentences.chinese: 本市各大商场经营品牌女装。

sentences.english: Favorite clothes: Students wear, ladies wear, urban fashion dress.
sentences.chinese: 学生装，淑女装，都市时尚装扮。

sentences.english: I bought a red and a green dress.
sentences.chinese: 我买了一套红绿色的女装。

sentences.english: Who says women's wear brands do not.
Chapter III is the last century, the study of Western women's fabric patterns.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是对近世纪西洋女装织物纹样的研究。

sentences.english: He disguised himself as a girl with a false long hair.
sentences.chinese: 他戴上假长发套男扮女装。

sentences.english: The high style didn't take on  for some time.
sentences.chinese: 这个女装新款式没流行多长时间。

sentences.english: Bodice is tight and form-fitting, waist skirt is loose, forming a cone-shaped modeling.
sentences.chinese: 女装上身紧身合体，下身宽松，形成一种圆锥状造型。

sentences.english: One startup that successfully used this technique was a high-end women's clothing boutique.
sentences.chinese: 成功采用该技法的新企业是一家高档女装专卖店。

definition: (of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)
(Internet slang) cosplay/to cosplay/to dress up as
(of a woman) to dress as a man (idiom)
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
